content.rendered:
IONNIC MAGNETIC HYBRID-BAR

Ionnic Magnetic Hybrid-Bar available for order now through Automax 4×4! Order online, come in & see us or give us a call on (02) 6699 2744 for a quote!

Features;

  • Half beacon half lightbar, the IONNIC Hybrid-Bar bridges the gap between the two groups.
  • 26 flash patterns.
  • Magnetic version features cigar plug with integrated on/off & pattern select switches.
  • Latest high output LED technology.
  • Robust housing and lens.
  • Can be synchronised.
  • Multi-voltage.
  • Full 360° light dispersion.
  • Environmentally sealed – IP67.
  • 5 year warranty

Specifications;

  • Voltage: 10-30V
  • Current Draw: Max. 6A @ 12V
  • Flash Patterns: 26
  • Mount: Magnetic
  • Lens: Polycarbonate
  • Base: ABS
  • Cable Length: 2.9m
  • Connector: Cigar Plug with switches
  • Weight: 1kg
  • Light Source: 24 x 3W LEDs
  • Approvals: SAE J845 Class1
  • Ingress Protection: IP67
  • Operating Temp: -40°C to 60°C

CLICK HERE to view the full range of products available for your 4×4!

Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!

excerpt.rendered:
